---
title: IPlistApi.plist_set_key_val method
---

Set the value of a node. Forces type of node to #PLIST_KEY

```csharp
public void plist_set_key_val(PlistHandle node, string val)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| node | the node |
| val | the key value |
